reference_summary:
Planeat
T. Colin Campbell  (Actor),     Caldwell Esselstyn Jr.  (Actor),     Shelley Lee Davies  (Director),     Or Shlomi  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Independently Distributed, Documentary
["Where have we gone wrong? Why has the death rate from heart disease and cancer exploded in recent times? Why are the ice caps melting, the oceans dying and the forests being cut down as we produce the food necessary to support our burgeoning populations? Against a backdrop of colorful and delicious food grown by organic farmers and prepared in the kitchens of world-famous chefs, PLANEAT for the first time brings together the ground-breaking studies of three prominent scientists who have made it their life's work to answer these questions."]
{'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Director': 'Shelley Lee Davies, Or Shlomi', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 11 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 3, 2012', 'Actors': 'T. Colin Campbell, Caldwell Esselstyn Jr.', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, German, Chinese', 'Studio': 'True Mind', 'Number of discs': '1'}
The interviews are very good, provide such great informative information and everyone should listen to what is being said and learn from it.
Great interviews
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jamie Payne', 'Harry Bradbeer', 'Coky Giedroyc', 'Sandra Goldbacher', 'Catherine Morshead'], 'Producers': ['Kudos Film and Production'], 'Starring': ['Dominic West', 'Romola Garai', 'Ben Whishaw'], 'Studio': ['BBC America']}
This program was a great and very interesting program. I was disappointed that the series was so short as I was just getting into and enjoying the program.
Give me more series
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jamie Payne', 'Sandra Goldbacher', 'Catherine Morshead'], 'Producers': ['Abi Morgan', 'Jane Featherstone', 'Derek Wax', 'Lucy Richer'], 'Starring': ['Dominic West', 'Romola Garai', 'Ben Whishaw'], 'Studio': ['BBC America']}
As I wrote before this was a fascination program with an interesting staff and interactions taking the audience on an emotional merry go round. more please!
Why only 2 episodes

Great season
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Susan Tully', 'Patrick Lau', 'Alan Grint', 'John Greening', 'Charlie Palmer', 'Moira Armstrong', 'Marc Jobst', 'David Tucker', 'Julian Holmes', 'Paul Marcus'], 'Producers': ['Annie Tricklebank', 'Sarah Brown', 'Bill Gallagher'], 'Starring': ['Olivia Hallinan', 'Julia Sawalha', 'Richard Harrington'], 'Studio': ['BBC America']}

Great piece of English life of yesteryear

profile:
**User Summary:**

This user maintains a strong and enduring interest in health and wellness, particularly focusing on nutrition's role in fighting diseases like heart disease and cancer. They regularly consume educational content and appreciate documentaries that delve into significant scientific themes and societal issues. Recently, they have broadened their interests to include engaging series with elements of suspense, while still favoring compelling narratives with historical contexts.

Their recent positive review of an entertaining series highlights their enjoyment of high-quality storytelling that creates emotional connections. They seek escapism through dynamic narratives, particularly those set in vibrant locales like London, balancing educational insights with entertaining experiences.

Key trends in their behavior include:
- A consistent emphasis on health and wellness content, especially nutrition.
- Engagement with documentaries and series that feature historical and societal narratives, alongside a growing appreciation for suspenseful storytelling.
- A strong preference for narratives that evoke emotional responses, prioritizing quality alongside educational richness.
- Favoring independently produced media with reputable figures in health and wellness, as well as receiving positive receptions of in-depth, captivating programming.

Overall, the user's evolving tastes reflect a harmonious blend of educational content and immersive entertainment, now enriched by their discovery of fun and entertaining series that resonate with their appreciation for well-crafted narratives.
